Name: CardEffectAddPyreStatusEmpowered
Conception: Add status to Pyre (empowered by ember)

Name: CardEffectChooseDraw
Conception: Choose and draw N from deck

Name: CardEffectTeleport
Conception: Move target to a random floor

Name: CardTraitMultiplyCharacterUpgrade
Notes: Multiply upgrade (attack, HP, size) by stat value (e.g. played cost this battle)

Name: RelicEffectRewind
Conception: First spell each turn returns to hand next turn
